summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2013 BUICK LACROSSE. THE CONTACT STATED THAT THERE WAS SOME SORT OF AN INTERNAL ELECTRICAL FAILURE WITH THE VEHICLE. THE RADIO AND THE BACK UP CAMERA FAILED TO FUNCTION. THE VEHICLE WAS TAKEN TO JOE JOHNSON CHEVROLET (1375 S MARKET ST, TROY, OH 45373, (937) 573-4252) FOR INSPECTION, BUT PROVIDED NO SPECIFIC TESTING AND DIAGNOSIS. THE VEHICLE WAS ALSO TAKEN TO AN INDEPENDENT MECHANIC FOR DIAGNOSTIC TESTING. THE MANUFACTURER WAS NOTIFIED OF THE FAILURE. THE VIN WAS NOT AVAILABLE. THE APPROXIMATE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS 44,000. UPDATED 08/24/17*LJ
